sentences.sentence: ABSTRACT: Wine is the classiest beverage in the world.
sentences.translation: 摘要：葡萄酒是世界上最时尚、神奇的饮料。

sentences.sentence: Good choice. Now if we can add a bit of color to your cheeks, you will be the classiest of the class.
sentences.translation: 好的选择。现在，如果我们可以添加一些颜色你的脸颊，你将有品位。

sentences.sentence: ABSTRACT: wine is the classiest beverage in the world. Here are 9 details about wine that will surprise and cultivate your knowledge.
sentences.translation: 摘要：葡萄酒是世界上最时尚、神奇的饮料。本文将揭露关于葡萄酒的9个小秘密，相信总有一个会令你吃惊的。
